RelatedSentence: By Reuters Media on May 19 , 2014 at 12:00 a.m. LITTLETON , Colorado ( Reuters ) - Lockheed Martin Corp has begun final assembly of a new U.S. weather satellite that will allow the  U.S. government  to provide far earlier warnings about potentially deadly tornadoes and solar flares when it is launched in early 2016 .
